Desc.eng: +50 HP regeneration per second\n-50% penalty to Inoculator effectiveness
+100 % HP regeneration\n+500 HP\n-50% penalty to Inoculator effectiveness
+30% damage\nNo critical hits are dealt
Swapping weapons reduces skill Cooldown by 50% and reloads Ammo.
Above 50% HP you suffer 20% more damage\nBelow 50% HP you suffer 40% less damage
Can't suffer more damage than 30% of your max HP from a single hit.
+1 second to global Cooldown\n-30% Cooldown to all skills\n+20% damage to skills with 2 seconds cooldown or more.
Instant resurrection, knocking back and stunning enemies in a 3 meter radius. Activated once per Mission (does not count as a death).
Suppression Resistance will never sink below medium level \nCharacter does not regenerate (can only be healed by the Inoculator or similar effects).
Focus does not recharge over time \n Suffering at least 5% of max HP from a single hit recharges +30 Focus.
Grants +10% Damage Reduction against melee attacks and -3% Damage Reduction against Ranged attacks.
Hits bestow 5% stacking resistance on the enemy for 5 seconds (for the damage type of the attack). Against all other damage types the same opponent suffers +1 stacking Vulnerability.
Regenerates Class Resource points per second instead of Hitpoints. The rate is 1/10th of the character's HP Regeneration per second.
Restores +50% of maximum Suppression Resist when killing Medium or Elite creatures.
+10% damage reduction bonus against Ranged attacks, -3% damage reduction penalty versus Melee attacks.
+100% Deflect bonus with Melee weapons, -20% to Armour based damage reduction.
Grants +2% bonus damage for every 10% of the Class Resource bar spent (up to +20% when the Class Resource is reduced to zero).
+10 Movement Speed bonus for -3% damage reduction penalty.
Getting killed provides a stacking +10% damage, +10% Suppression Resist regeneration and +5% damage reduction bonus for the duration of the mission.
Armour skill use provides +10% damage reduction and +30% damage bonus for 5 seconds.
Grants +1% Dodge bonus for every 5% of the Class Resource bar present (up to +20% when the Class Resource is full).
+20 Dodge bonus during movement, -10 Dodge penalty for standing still longer than 3 second.
Kills provide +40 HP Regeneration per second for 10 seconds (non-stacking).
+20 Dodge bonus against Ranged attacks with -10 Movement Speed penalty.
Class Resource cost is halved for Dodge moves and Armour skills, but Inoculator effect duration is also halved.
+20% Melee damage when surrounded by 3 or more enemies
+20% Ranged damage when moving (the bonus lasts for 2 seconds after a stop)
+5% damage for every kill for 5 seconds (stacking)
+3 Dodge for every Surprise kill for 10 seconds (stacking)
+20% damage at maximum Warp Heat
+10% damage for every buff effect on the character
+20 Movement speed for every kill for 5 seconds (non-stacking)
Increased chance for beneficial Warp Anomalies.
+100% HP regeneration\n+500 bonus HP\n-50% penalty to Inoculator effectiveness
+10 to Dodge\nDodge move is permanently disabled
Suppression Resistance will never decrease\nCharacter does not regenerate (can only be healed by the Inoculator or similar effects)
Belt abilities gain +2 charges, supply crates yield +1 charge
Damage bonus percent equal to your Deflect value (applies to all attacks)
+25% Damage and mobility skills gain -50% cooldown when HP drops below 50%
+10% Critical hit chance\n-10% Maximum HP
+10% Critical hit strength\n-3% Damage reduction
Each kill provides +1% Critical hit chance and +1% Critical hit strength for 5 seconds (stacks)
The Executioner bonus has a chance for double strength equal to your Critical hit chance
+50% Executioner bonus strength and duration
Each Critical hit puts vulnerability on the target with the damage type of the attack (stacks)
+5% Critical hit chance and +10% Critical hit strength against debuffed enemies
Aimed and Sniper attacks deal +50% damage while your Suppression Resistance is in the green
+20% Movement speed while your Suppression Resistance is in the green
+3% Damage Reduction per second while standing still (maximum 15%)
+50% magazine capacities and overheat threshold values for all weapons
+5% Damage per second while standing still (maximum 50%)
Grenades and mines costs 20 Focus instead of charges and Supply crates fully recharge Focus (only with grenades and mines, other equipment skills like shields work normally)
+20% Damage while attacking from Surprise
+50% Melee Damage for 5 seconds after performing a Dodge move
+10 Dodge for 5 seconds after each kill (non-stacking)
Melee Damage bonus equal to 50% of HP/second regeneration value, for 3 seconds after taking damage
+50% Damage to skills with 3 second or longer cooldown rate but also +3 seconds cooldown to these skills
33% chance to reset weapon skill after use for skills with 8 second or longer cooldown rate
33% chance to reset weapon skill after use for skills with 5 second or longer cooldown rate
+75% Damage while at maximum Warp Heat
+2 Adrenaline for each incoming attack that deals damage to the character (only +1 if the incoming attack is stopped by Dodge)
+3 seconds DOT duration
+50% DOT damage
Killing an enemy with skills that have the sniper tag resets the Cooldown of that skill

Each sniper shot creates a Sniper Mark on the target for 30 seconds (stacks maximum 10 times). Each mark reduces the target's Movement Speed by 3% and increases damage for further sniper shots by 20%.
Using the Personal Teleporter skill costs 30 Adremaline instead of charges and Supply crates fully recharge Adrenaline
+25% ranged Damage against targets within medium range
Using psychic powers while at maximum Warp Heat heals you instead of causing damage
Each kill reduces Warp Heat by one
+50% Damage to all psychic powers but +2 seconds to their Cooldown
Psychic powers gain a damage bonus inversely proportional to the current Warp Heat compared to maximum Warp Heat (+75% Damage at zero Warp Heat, no bonus at maximum Warp Heat)
Each attack with force weapons bestows +15% Damage to further force weapon attacks for 5 seconds (stacks a maximum of 10 times)
Bonuses from psychic powers last twice as long on the character
Decreasing Warp Heat regenerates 50 Hp and 50 Suppression for each point of Warp Heat removed
+2% Damage to weapon attacks for each point of Warp Heat
Decreasing Warp Heat bestows +50% Damage to weapon skills for 3 seconds (except force weapons and psychic powers; non-stacking)
Skill cooldowns are halved and psychic powers generate half the amount of Warp Heat during Time Warp

Using psychic powers creates a Psychic Zone around the character (unless already standing in a Psychic Zone). While standing in the Psychic Zone, each subsequent psychic power gains an incremental damage bonus based on the number of psychic powers previously used in the zone. The Psychic Zone lasts for 20 seconds.
Psychic powers gain a damage bonus proportional to the amount of missing Health (+200% Damage on 0 HP, no bonus at maximum Health)
Each time a psychic power is used, all other psychic powers gain +5% Damage for 10 seconds (stacking)
Each time a psychic power is used further psychic powers gain -5% Cooldown for 10 seconds (stacking)
+8% Damage to all equipped psychic powers after each equipped damage dealing psychic power
Each time you deal damage with a DOT effect heals 0.3% of Maximum Health
+50% Damage against enemies affected by debuffs
+50% duration to debuff effects on enemies
-1 Warp Heat each time you create a debuff effect
+10 Suppression Resistance for each point on the Puritan morality axis
Each 3 point on the Radical morality axis increases the class resource generation rate by 1% (Crusaders and Assassins gain Focus and Adrenaline faster, Psykers lose Warp Heat faster)
